alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 20 at 6:34AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall from last night is ongoing. * WHERE...A portion of west central Arizona, including the following county, La Paz. * WHEN...Until 945 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of Centennial Wash and smaller tributaries in the McMullen Valley as well as other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 634 AM MST, Stream gauge reports indicated flooding was occurring in Centennial Wash. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Centennial Wash and Salome Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Wenden and Salome. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
